response.overview: Each year, America's collegiates migrate south for an all-out orgy called Spring Break. The fun begins at the wet t-shirt contests - the cornerstone of Spring Break. We love to capture those moments when coeds finally decide to get wild and share it all with a crowd of horny college guys. The crowd cheers "Show Your Tits!... Show Your Bush!!"... and these hot collegiates don't let the chanting crowds down! Between the contests, you'll see hot coeds showing it in the nightclubs where anything's likely to happen! This years crazy coeds made this our best Spring Break ever!
response.title: Dream Girls: Spring Break 2006
